description: Tribonacci array: triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0)=1 for n >= 0, T(n,1)=T(n,2n)=1 for n >= 1, T(n,2)=1 for n >= 2 and for n >= 3, T(n,k)=T(n-1,k-3)+T(n-1,k-2)+T(n-1,k-1) for 3<=k<=2n-1.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if( k<0 || k>2*n, 0, if( k<3 || k==2*n, 1, T(n-1, k-3) + T(n-1, k-2) + T(n-1,k-1)))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 14 2004 */(Haskell)a027023 n k = a027023_tabf !! (n-1) !!
